attributes.action: we would like the government to abolish the T.V licence fee in Britian.
attributes.additional_details:
I don't think it fair that we could be sent to prison with a criminal record in this day and age for watching television.
What we pay is more than double any other subscription.
And their is no quality anymore of what you get shown.
attributes.background:
review the whole system of paying for a T.V license and.
Make it a subscription service in the market to compete with the rest of television.
